Author: patri3110
Text: :( water is good for you and i promise it helps get rid of bloating. It helps flush out all the water your body is holding onto thats making you bloat. The more you drink water the better your body will behave. Maybe drink some tea, it can help as well especially before bed. But yea bloating is such a struggle i feel you.
